title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei SS - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Martial Arts   Romance   School Life   Sci-fi   Seinen   Supernatural
author: Satou Tsutomu   佐島勤
description:
A collection of side stories about various characters in Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei. During Nine School Competition event on Second Year, Tatsuya is fighting against a humanoid weapon. Meanwhile, on other side, students are fighting and struggling to get the highest score in competitions.

Includes following short stories:

– A Mikihiko story, Dragon God Prisoner
– A Eimi story, Shotgun
– A Kanon and Shizuku story, I can do it alone
– A Kuroba Twin story, Drawing attention mission
– A Erika and Saijou story, Temptation from Rose>
